name: Eggy Puzzle
description:
This is a really small prototype, the full game is coming soon! Give me as much feedback you can! :)

Controls: 

  • Left and Right Arrows: Movement
  • Spacebar: Jump, Climb Ladders
  • Up Arrow: Turn On Switches
  • Down Arrow: Turn Off Switches, Use The key and Enter the door
  • R: Restart

Credits:

Programming:

  • Amananka

Graphics:

  • Alfredsheep ( Free Asset with: The Character, Tileset and Others )
  • OnixGames ( Font )
  • Amananka ( Cover Art )
